entry.title: Trolli Apple O's Gummy Candy - 120 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ferrara Candy Co.
Type: Candy
Price: 3.99

No Need to Mind the Seeds!

     For an apple flavour that's only comparable to the freshly picked fruit from a fine orchard, try Trolli Apple O's! They're soft, squishy, sour and fun - the perfect treat to share with friends or to upgrade your snack stash.

See the rest of our delicious Trolli gummies, there's a flavour for everyone!

4.25oz / 120g | 1 peg bag

entry.title: Trolli Evil Twins - 120g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ferrara Candy Co.
Type: Candy
Price: 3.99

A Flavour Duo That Never Gets Old!

      During some late-night experiments, Dr. Gum E. Werm flipped the wrong switch and accidentally created some problematic twins. Joined at the hip, one is sweet but the other is super sour!

     They may not make for great friends, but they're fantastically yummy! The flavours of sweet and sour balance out perfectly to give you a gummy treat that might just become a new favourite. There are 3 crazy flavour combos: Angelic Orange & Mischievous Lime, Sweet Strawberry & Rowdy Blue Raspberry, and Charming Cherry & Wicked Lemon!

See the rest of our delicious Trolli gummies, there's a flavour for everyone!

4.25oz / 120g | 1 peg bag

Featuring Only the Best of Trolli

     This crazy crew of characters has joined together to form the ultimate sour squad! Trolli Sour Brite All-Star Mix has all the sour neon gummies you love from Trolli, like Llamas, Sloths, Crawlers, and Octopuses.

     Of course tons of friends means tons of flavour! Take your pick from Strawberry-Grape, Mango-Fruit Punch, and Pineapple-Raspberry.

entry.title: Trolli Sour Brite Dip 'N Crawlers - 1.55oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ferrara Candy Co.
Type: Candy
Price: 3.49

What Level Of Sour Are You?

     Get ready to dunk! Trolli Sour Brite Dip 'N Crawlers are deliciously juicy gummy worms that include a pool of tangy sour powder to give each bite the perfect amount of sour flavour for you!

     Do you want a mouth-puckering mouthful that'll go down in history? Or just a touch of sour power to balance the sweet? However you enjoy them, it's always more fun when you can share with a friend!

entry.summary:
Vendor: Ferrara Candy Co.
Type: Candy
Price: 3.99

An Incomparable Watermelon Taste!

     Trolli Sour Brite Crawlers Watermelon are fun neon sour gummies with a bold, juicy Watermelon flavour that'll remind you of a summer picnic on a beautifully warm day. One bite is enough to thoroughly excite your tastebuds!

     Don't forget to share these tangy and sweet confections, everyone getting to experience their yummy flavour makes them all the sweeter!

entry.title: Trolli Sour Gummi Creations Martian Mix - 120g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ferrara Candy Co.
Type: Candy
Price: 3.99

The Perfect Way to Play with Your Food!

     These gummies are seriously out of this world! Trolli Sour Gummi Creations Martian Mix gives you the captain's seat on the S.S. Creativity where you decide how you want to build your favourite Martian!

     Each piece is coated in tangy sugar and can be any one of these 6 juicy, fruity flavours: Strawberry, Pineapple, Lemonade, Watermelon, Mango, and Blue Raspberry. With over 200 flavour combinations available for you to experiment with, your tastebuds will be excitedly moon-walking the whole time!

See the rest of our delicious Trolli gummies, there's a flavour for everyone!

entry.title: Trolli Sour Brite Sloths - 120g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ferrara Candy Co.
Type: Candy
Price: 3.99

Yummy Sloths to Hit the Spot!

     These are some crazy, tangy critters! Trolli Sour Brite Sloths offer a burst of juicy and sour flavour in every bite, each one giving you an awesome 2-in-1 flavour that'll knock your socks off!

     You can find these wild Sloths in a great variety of delicious flavours like: Pineapple-Lime, Strawberry-Grape, and Blue Raspberry-Berry Punch. It's so much fun to link them like a bunch of barrel monkeys and slowly drop them in your mouth!

entry.title: Minion Gummies - 50ct
entry.summary:
Vendor: Regal Confections
Type: Bulk
Price: 5.99

A Tasty and Goofy Treat to Share

     What's more fun than a gummy treat that's shaped just like one of the loveable Minions from Despicable Me? The only thing we can think of is 50 of them! 

     Each gummy Minion is individually wrapped making this bag an easy and affordable option to hand out to trick-or-treaters on Halloween. They also make great piñata stuffers or snacks for a fantastic party!

250g | 1 bulk bag contains 50 individually wrapped pieces

entry.title: Sour Power Straws Wild Cherry - 1.75oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dorval
Type: Candy
Price: 2.49

A Nostalgic Treat with a Tangy Kick!

     Thin straws of deliciously sweet and viciously sour candy come in each pack of Sour Power Straws! This is a flavour combo that's sure to light up your tastebuds with electric delight. 

    Traverse an orchard lined with fruit-bearing trees, each one's branches heavy with the weight of fresh and juicy cherries in every bite of these delicious Wild Cherry sour straws. This is a treat that's impossible to resist, a true delight no matter what your age!
  • Non-GMO
  • Gelatin-Free

1.75oz / 50g | 1 pack

entry.title: Rip Rolls Watermelon - 1.4oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Foreign Candy Company
Type: Candy
Price: 1.99

A Whole Roll of Fun Flavour!

    A wild roll that just keeps going and going, any fan of sweet and sour licorice goodness will love these awesome Rip Rolls Watermelon! 

     Made with delicious fruit juice, the sour sugar and intense fruit clash to give your tastebuds a disco dance party of flavour. It's easy to get lost in the juicy and fresh watermelon taste; you'll be strapped in for a 40-inch flavourful ride you won't forget!

  • Fat-Free

 

1.4oz / 40g | 1 roll
